name: ScanIDme Inc

description:

We are practitioner of the lean startup and agile development methodologies.
We are experts on the Titanium Appcelerator framework that allows for native and cross platform development on iOS and Android. This greatly reduces costs and time to market.
We work with you to create an app that offers your unique value proposition to your customers.
We will deliver on time and on budget.
